extendedInfo.description: "We are here to talk"Simple straight and anonym Textchat.You can talk with others who have a mobile, also with friends just on their PC.Chat World includes several Rooms that are available here in the Android Market seperatly.Like: Continents, US Cities, Singles, HipHop, Android, Gamers, Yoga, Save the World ...Attention:This is an anonymously Chatsystem. Do not provide any private Data of your own. Chatworld can not take responsibility for what other user do with the information you do provide into the chat. Please read the RULES in the Application and keep on them. Otherwise you are not allowed to use this Program.

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: How come everytime I try to enter a room, I get redirected to a page for candy crush??
reviews.author: Jacob Simon

reviews.title: Stupid ads keep crashing it
reviews.comment: Almost everytime I click on the app, it force closes because of an ad or the ad will just stay on the screen and you can\'t see the chat. Fix this and it\'ll be 5 stars
reviews.author: Jesse Horton

reviews.title: Crap No Moderators!
reviews.comment: This app has nothing but spammers who ruin conversations with stupid spam there is supposed to be moderators but they never appear, Also it says you have to be +18 yet there are 13 thru 16 year olds on here? Everyone has the right to stupidity, but some abuse the privilege.
reviews.author: Joshua Moats

reviews.comment: It\'s not a bad chat room...IF you have ffm. Otherwise, don\'t bother b/c everyone just wants to talk there and it\'s only available for gay iPhone!
